"It's not that you're not good at playing the guitar, it's just that you're not passionate about it."
"You may be struggling with playing the guitar because you haven't found the right style or genre that resonates with you."
"Perhaps you need to practice more regularly and take lessons to improve your technique and skills."
"You might be trying too hard to learn the guitar and need to relax and enjoy the process."
"It's possible that you're comparing yourself to others who are more advanced and need to focus on your own progress."
